lt.vtvpmc.municipality

Interface Municipality


  • public interface Municipality
    Municipality is a registry of its members.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Person findOldestPerson()
      Retrieves the oldest person in municipality.
      int getCitizenCount()
      Retrieves a number of citizens registered in a municipality.
      boolean isRegisteredCitizen(Person person)
      Checks if person is a registered citizen in this municipality.
      void registerCitizen(Person person)
      Registers a new citizen in a municipality.
      double totalIncomeInTaxes()
      Returns total yearly tax income for municipality.

    • Method Detail

      • registerCitizen

        void registerCitizen(Person person)
              throws IllegalCitizenException
        Registers a new citizen in a municipality. The same citizen can not be registered twice, but the method will produce no errors if attempt to register a member the second time is made.
        Parameters:
        person - person to be registered in Municipality
        Throws:
        IllegalCitizenException - thrown if citizen contains no first name, last name or birthdate, his income is negative or his birthdate is in the future.

      • isRegisteredCitizen

        boolean isRegisteredCitizen(Person person)
        Checks if person is a registered citizen in this municipality.
        Parameters:
        person - person to check citizenship of
        Returns:
        true if person is a citizen in this municipality, false otherwise

      • findOldestPerson

        Person findOldestPerson()
        Retrieves the oldest person in municipality. If there are several citizens with matching birthdays, that qualify as oldest - any of one them can be returned.
        Returns:
        oldest citizen

      • totalIncomeInTaxes

        double totalIncomeInTaxes()
        Returns total yearly tax income for municipality. Taxes earned are calculated by taking 15% of every citizens yearly income. Few exceptions apply:
        • Citizens with yearly income bellow 14 000 euros are not taxed.
        • Citizens who earn above 1 million a year, pay 16% tax on all of their income.
        Returns:
        total tax earnings of municipality in euros

      • getCitizenCount

        int getCitizenCount()
        Retrieves a number of citizens registered in a municipality.
        Returns:
        number of citizens registered in municipality.
